document_data.name: cursed Imaskari flask
document_data.mainbody: the '''cursed Imaskari flask'''<ref group="note">Note that this flask is never referred to using this name in the book: it is merely described. was an Imaskari relic unearthed from the ruins of Solon by the slaves of [[Ambuchar Devayam]].{{cite book/Blood Charge|54}}
document_data.Powers: The flask could provide up to 10 gallons of water per day. The water out of the flask would be green and foul-smelling.
